sentences.en: The courts ordered busing to desegregate the schools.
sentences.cn: 法律规定要用校车运送学生来打破学校的种族隔离。

sentences.en: The United States was working to desegregate the military, schools, and all public facilities.
sentences.cn: 美国当时正在着手废除对军队、学校和所有公共设施实施的种族隔离。

sentences.en: We have succeeded in persuading many districts to desegregate voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 我们已圆满地劝服了许多地方自愿取消种族隔离.

trans.tran_en: to end a system in which people of different races are kept separate
